rooms.description: Main entrance with a vestibule, incorporating Vastu principles by aligning the door in an auspicious direction.
Spacious living area designed with multi-purpose furniture and large windows for ample natural light. Vastu principles considered by positioning the seating arrangement towards the east.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the living room. Vastu guidelines suggest placement in the south-east corner for prosperity.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances and efficient workflow design. Vastu principles recommend placing the stove on the east side for optimal energy flow.
Dedicated home office in a quiet corner of the apartment. Vastu recommends positioning it in the northeast for knowledge and career success.
Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony. Vastu principles suggest placing the bed away from direct door view for privacy.
Secondary bedroom with a balcony. Vastu guidelines indicate placing the bed in the southwest direction to enhance stability.
Additional bedroom with balcony, designed for budget efficiency. Vastu principles suggest aligning the sleeping area to face north.
Additional bedroom with balcony, incorporating cost-effective design. Vastu guidelines recommend placing the bed in the northwest for restful sleep.
Compact bathroom integrated within the living area. Designed with cost-effective fixtures and Vastu-aligned water placement.
Multi-functional storage space allocated within the entrance or living area to optimize space on a tight budget.

openings.description: Ensures secure entry with Vastu-compliant alignment.
Providing ample natural light and ventilation for each bedroom as per Vastu principles.
Dedicated two-car garage designed to optimize space within the plot constraints while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Strategically placed windows for maximum natural light following Vastu recommendations.

notes.budget_focus: Cost-effective design elements and multi-purpose spaces have been prioritized to adhere to the tight budget while meeting contemporary aesthetic requirements.
notes.vastu_alignment: Vastu principles are integrated for all major components of the floor plan, ensuring harmony with natural elements.
